articles.description: The Leicester City boss gives his thoughts on the performances of Kasey McAteer and Lewis Brunt after his side's 1-0 win over Gillingham in the third round of the FA Cup
articles.content:
Kasey McAteer and Lewis Brunt have strengthened their bid for more regular appearances after Brendan Rodgers said he learned plenty about the pair in the 1-0 win at Gillingham.
 McAteer and Brunt st… [+2412 chars]

articles.title: Collin Morikawa shoots 7-under 66 | Round 2 | Sentry | 2023 - PGA TOUR
articles.description: In the second round of the 2023 Sentry Tournament of Champions, Collin Morikawa broke clear of the pack with a 7-under par 66 to take the solo lead.SUBSCRIBE...
